Global assessments require synthesizing freely available information that is highly heterogeneous from nearly one hundred sources. Before being incorporated into OHI models, data from each source must be organized, transformed, rescaled, formatted and potentially gap-filled by our collaborative team, who also document metadata and processing decisions.
